entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening and overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
